name: Beat Fighter
description:
A 2D 1v1 rhythm fighting game where players look around the map to search and pick up random instruments. The players select a difficulty to play the instrument with and must hit the beats that come scrolling down the screen. The more accurate the beats, the more damage they deal to the other player.

(Due to screen scaling issues some UI will seem a bit off so play in full screen to help a little bit with the issue. Thanks!)
